pli-tv-bu-vb-pc36:1.17: That is, why did he not say that the food was not leftover.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc36:2.1.12: _Akappiyakataṃ hoti_, literally, “It is done with what is not allowable.” The “it,” both here and below, refers to the ceremony of making it allowable, and the “what” refers to the food.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc36:2.1.28: The last of these three ways of knowing presumably refers to the other monk having told him directly. See discussion in note to _nissaggiya pācittiya_ 30, [](MS.1.2425).
